name: The Drift
description:
Play as the Alabama-bound detective Richard Dahl as he pursues a cold lead to an infamous serial killer known as The Smiler, as they fled to an abandoned town called Wasburn. 

Each of Smiler's clues leads to the next in a series, find them all to find where the killer is hiding next! If you get stuck, call Peter from the police force for a hint.

Features a cast of 3, fully voiced characters:

Richard Dahl by Marcus Arnold

The Smiler by Rob Sandoval

Peter at the force by Kyle "Dan" Cook

NOTE: This was made almost entirely solo, and is still in development, so please excuse the bugs, and comment what you notice, feedback is appreciated!
